title: en pATTunandu
sahitya:
en pATTunadu pinpATTE mun pATTanArE Om


anupallavi

  anbATTAlE aruLATTum kaTTazhagA kuzhagA vazhi nI gati nI


caraNam    shen silamboli shei tiruvaDi naTamE cittat-tuDiyAnEn kuncitapAdam 
nenjinil Adak-kuraiyEn puraiyEn iraiyE nAn un niraivE paramA kuralun 
kuralE kuzhaivun kuzhaivE niralun ninaivE nimalA sharaNam
